title: Basic Usage
content: For details, see the following example.
findIntroStr: When there is a large amount of data, data is split by page. This function is usually used in Grid and Repeater components.

title: Current Page
content: Use current-page to set the number of initially loaded pages, and use total to set the total number of records
findIntroStr: When there is a large amount of data, data is split by page. This function is usually used in Grid and Repeater components.

title: number mode
content: Set the component rendering mode through mode="number"
findIntroStr: When there is a large amount of data, data is split by page. This function is usually used in Grid and Repeater components.

title: fixed mode
content: Set the component rendering mode through mode="fixed"
findIntroStr: When there is a large amount of data, data is split by page. This function is usually used in Grid and Repeater components.

title: simple mode
content: Set the component rendering mode through mode="simple"
findIntroStr: When there is a large amount of data, data is split by page. This function is usually used in Grid and Repeater components.

title: complete mode
content: Set the component rendering mode through mode="complete"
findIntroStr: When there is a large amount of data, data is split by page. This function is usually used in Grid and Repeater components.

title: Total Pages
content: Set the total number of pages through page-count
findIntroStr: When there is a large amount of data, data is split by page. This function is usually used in Grid and Repeater components.

title: Paging event size-change
content: size-change Triggered when the number of records on each page changes
findIntroStr: When there is a large amount of data, data is split by page. This function is usually used in Grid and Repeater components.

title: Paging event current-change
content: current-change Triggered when the current page number is switched
findIntroStr: When there is a large amount of data, data is split by page. This function is usually used in Grid and Repeater components.

title: Paging event prev-click
content: prev-click Triggered when switching to the previous page
findIntroStr: When there is a large amount of data, data is split by page. This function is usually used in Grid and Repeater components.

title: Paging event next-click
content: next-click Triggered when switching to the next page
findIntroStr: When there is a large amount of data, data is split by page. This function is usually used in Grid and Repeater components.

title: Paging event before-page-change
content: before-page-change Pre-paging event
findIntroStr: When there is a large amount of data, data is split by page. This function is usually used in Grid and Repeater components.

title: Paging drop-down list box display position
content:
Indicates whether to add an element in the

popper-append-to-body paging drop-down list box to the body element node. The default value of this attribute is true, indicating that the element is added to the body element node by default.

If you do not want to add it to the body element node, set :popper-append-to-body="false"
findIntroStr: When there is a large amount of data, data is split by page. This function is usually used in Grid and Repeater components.

title: Class name of the customized paging drop-down list box
content: popper-class You can customize the class name of the paging drop-down list box
findIntroStr: When there is a large amount of data, data is split by page. This function is usually used in Grid and Repeater components.

title: Customized pagination layout
content: layout Set the paging layout. You can adjust the position of slot in layout to adjust the position where the slot content is rendered.
findIntroStr: When there is a large amount of data, data is split by page. This function is usually used in Grid and Repeater components.

title: Number of page buttons
content: pager-count Set the number of pages
findIntroStr: When there is a large amount of data, data is split by page. This function is usually used in Grid and Repeater components.

title: Number of pages to be displayed
content:
Use

page-sizes together with page-size to adjust the number of pages to be displayed on each page.
findIntroStr: When there is a large amount of data, data is split by page. This function is usually used in Grid and Repeater components.

title: Hide pagination when there is only one page.
content: hide-on-single-page Hide paging when there is only one page
findIntroStr: When there is a large amount of data, data is split by page. This function is usually used in Grid and Repeater components.

title: Customize the text of the page-up button
content: prev-text ,next-text Custom Page Up Button Text
findIntroStr: When there is a large amount of data, data is split by page. This function is usually used in Grid and Repeater components.

title: Grid Table Pagination
content: The grid table uses the pagination component. The services/getGridMockData service in this example needs to be implemented by yourself. The example simulates the data returned by the remote service.
findIntroStr: When there is a large amount of data, data is split by page. This function is usually used in Grid and Repeater components.
